hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CDE, DSCPTN FROM RMS_ENTY_PNT ORDER BY UPPER(DSCPTN)
SELECT CDE, DSCPTN FROM RMS_ENTY_PNT WHERE CDE = :CODE
INSERT INTO RMS_ENTY_PNT ( CDE, DSCPTN, CRET_DTM, CRET_LGN_UID, LST_UPDT_DTM, LST_UPDT_LGN_UID ) VALUES ( :CODE, :DESCRIPTION, :CREATED_DT, :CREATED_BY, :UPDATED_DT, :UPDATED_BY )
UPDATE RMS_ENTY_PNT SET DSCPTN = :DESCRIPTION, LST_UPDT_DTM = :UPDATED_DT, LST_UPDT_LGN_UID = :UPDATED_BY WHERE CDE = :CODE
DELETE FROM RMS_ENTY_PNT WHERE CDE IN (:CODES)
